main event: A civilian observed a streak of light resembling a meteor in Yonkers, New York on December 5, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as being twice the size of a star and had a whitish-red color.,The sighting lasted 9 seconds.,The object appeared to slow slightly and had a slight glow in front of it.,The object burned out and blinked in before disappearing.,The observation was made while the witness was driving a car.
